distribution_pattern: Product was shipped to KY, IN & OH.
product_description: LaRosa's Italian Dressing, 1.5oz plastic packet. Labeled in part, "INGREDIENTS: Soybean Oil, Water, Cultured ?Buttermilk, Distilled Vinegar, Romano Cheese, Part Skim Milk***Egg Yolk***Whey Protein Concentrate***CONTAINS: MILK EGGS***Packed for LaRosa's Inc, Cincinnati, OH 45238" UPC 0 70200 85107

code_info: Packet Code UB070115C, Packet Code UB072215C & Packet Code UB080415C
